dialogue: I'd like to see someone about my rejected expense report.
The problem is that you didn't submit a receipt for your bridge toll.
Or maybe the problem is that you have a joyless, dead-end job.
And your boss doesn't allow you to use your own judgment because working here is proof that you don't make good decisions.
Rejecting my expense report gives you the illusion of power, and nourishes your shriveled and dying ego.
Actually, I was going to approve it.
You don't have to get an attitude about it.
